{
    levels governors_house governors_villa governors_palace proconsuls_palace imperial_palace 
    {
        governors_house requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {

            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min village

        }
        governors_villa requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {

            }

            cost  800

            }

        {
            capability

building praetorian_institution
{
    levels praetorian_institution_01 praetorian_institution_02
    {
        praetorian_institution_01 requires factions { roman, } and building_present_min_level barracks army_barracks or building_present_min_level core_building imperial_palace
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "roman praetorian cohort i"  0  requires factions { roman, } and marian_reforms 
                law_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction 5
            cost 3200
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
		praetorian_institution_02
            }
        }
        praetorian_institution_02 requires factions { roman, } and building_present_min_level barracks royal_barracks
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "roman praetorian cohort i"  0  requires factions { roman, } and marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman praetorian cohort urban i"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms
                law_bonus bonus 2
            }

    }

building equestrian
{
    levels stables cavalry_barracks hippodrome circus_maximus 
    {

        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
	;------ smith -------

                recruit "bi moorish raiders"  0  requires factions { numidia, }

                recruit "bi desert cavalry"  0  requires factions { numidia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "barb noble cavalry" 0  requires factions { dacia, gauls, germans, }
                recruit "merc sarmatian cavalry"  0  requires factions { scythia, } 
                recruit "barb noble horse archers scythian"  0  requires factions { scythia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "east heavy cavalry"  0  requires factions { pontus, } 
                recruit "east persian cavalry"  0  requires factions { parthia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "east cataphract archer"  0  requires factions { armenia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "egyptian nubian cavalry"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek medium cavalry"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman cavalry auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "bi equites sagittarii"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
;-----------------
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  2400 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                hippodrome
            }
        }
        hippodrome requires factions { barbarian, carthage, eastern, egyptian, greek_cities, macedon, seleucid, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
	;------ smith -------
                recruit "barb chariot light briton"  0  requires factions { britons, } and building_present_min_level smith blacksmith
                recruit "east scythed chariot"  0  requires factions { pontus, seleucid, } and building_present_min_level smith blacksmith
                recruit "egyptian chariot"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } and building_present_min_level smith blacksmith
                recruit "rebel amazon chariots"  0  requires factions { slave, } and building_present_min_level smith blacksmith
	;--------------------
                recruit "carthaginian cavalry"  0  requires factions { spain, carthage, } 
                recruit "barb cavalry" 0  requires factions { dacia, gauls, germans, scythia, }
                recruit "bi moorish raiders"  0  requires factions { numidia, } 
                recruit "east cavalry"  0  requires factions { pontus, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "east horse archer"  0  requires factions { armenia, parthia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "egyptian cavalry"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek light lancer"  0  requires factions { macedon, } 
                recruit "greek cavalry"  0  requires factions { seleucid, thrace, greek_cities, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "roman light cavalry"  1  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman medium cavalry"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
	;------ smith -------
                recruit "barb chariot heavy briton"  0  requires factions { britons, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
                recruit "rebel amazon chariots"  2  requires factions { slave, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
                recruit "east chariot archer"  0  requires factions { pontus, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
                recruit "egyptian chariot archer"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
	;--------------------
                recruit "carthaginian medium cavalry"  0  requires factions { spain, carthaginian, } 
                recruit "bi desert cavalry"  0  requires factions { numidia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "barb noble cavalry" 0  requires factions { dacia, gauls, germans, }
                recruit "merc sarmatian cavalry"  0  requires factions { scythia, } 
                recruit "barb noble horse archers scythian"  0  requires factions { scythia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "east heavy cavalry"  0  requires factions { pontus, } 
                recruit "east persian cavalry"  0  requires factions { parthia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "east cataphract archer"  0  requires factions { armenia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "egyptian nubian cavalry"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek medium cavalry"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman cavalry auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "bi equites sagittarii"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
;-----------------
;------- 3 -------
                recruit "east cappodocian cavalry"  0  requires factions { pontus, } 
                recruit "east heavy cataphract"  0  requires factions { armenia, parthia, seleucid, } 
                recruit "egyptian cleruch"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek heavy cavalry"  0  requires factions { macedon, } 
                recruit "bi scholae palatinae"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman heavy cavalry"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  4800 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                circus_maximus
            }
        }
        circus_maximus requires factions { carthage, parthia, macedon, seleucid, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
	;------ smith -------
                recruit "barb chariot light briton"  0  requires factions { britons, } and building_present_min_level smith blacksmith
                recruit "east scythed chariot"  0  requires factions { pontus, seleucid, } and building_present_min_level smith blacksmith
                recruit "egyptian chariot"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } and building_present_min_level smith blacksmith
                recruit "rebel amazon chariots"  0  requires factions { slave, } and building_present_min_level smith blacksmith
	;--------------------
                recruit "carthaginian cavalry"  0  requires factions { spain, carthage, } 
                recruit "barb cavalry" 0  requires factions { dacia, gauls, germans, scythia, }
                recruit "bi moorish raiders"  0  requires factions { numidia, } 
                recruit "east cavalry"  0  requires factions { pontus, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "east horse archer"  0  requires factions { armenia, parthia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field

                recruit "greek light lancer"  0  requires factions { macedon, } 
                recruit "greek cavalry"  0  requires factions { seleucid, thrace, greek_cities, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "roman light cavalry"  2  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman medium cavalry"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
	;------ smith -------
                recruit "barb chariot heavy briton"  0  requires factions { britons, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
                recruit "rebel amazon chariots"  2  requires factions { slave, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
                recruit "east chariot archer"  0  requires factions { pontus, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
                recruit "egyptian chariot archer"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
	;--------------------
                recruit "carthaginian medium cavalry"  0  requires factions { spain, carthaginian, } 
                recruit "bi desert cavalry"  0  requires factions { numidia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "barb noble cavalry" 0  requires factions { dacia, gauls, germans, }
                recruit "merc sarmatian cavalry"  0  requires factions { scythia, } 
                recruit "barb noble horse archers scythian"  0  requires factions { scythia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "east heavy cavalry"  0  requires factions { pontus, } 
                recruit "east persian cavalry"  0  requires factions { parthia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "east cataphract archer"  0  requires factions { armenia, } and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
                recruit "egyptian nubian cavalry"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek medium cavalry"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman cavalry auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms and building_present_min_level missiles target_field

;------- 3 -------
                recruit "east cappodocian cavalry"  0  requires factions { pontus, } 
                recruit "east heavy cataphract"  0  requires factions { armenia, parthia, seleucid, } 
                recruit "egyptian cleruch"  0  requires factions { egyptian, }

                recruit "greek royal cavalry"  0  requires factions { seleucid, macedon, } 
                recruit "roman praetorian cavalry"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
            }
            construction  7

building control_organize_race
{
    levels control_organize_race_01 control_organize_race_02
    {
        control_organize_race_01 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level equestrian hippodrome
        {
            capability
            {
		taxable_income_bonus bonus 3
                stage_races 1 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
            }
            construction 5
            cost 3200
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
		control_organize_race_02
            }
        }
        control_organize_race_02 requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level equestrian circus_maximus
        {
            capability
            {
		taxable_income_bonus bonus 6
                stage_races 2 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building menagerie
{
    levels menagerie_control menagerie_kennel menagerie_pigsty
    {
        menagerie_control requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and resource dogs or resource pigs or resource wild_animals or resource timber or resource hides or resource furs
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction 1
            cost 400
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                menagerie_kennel
            }
        }
        menagerie_kennel requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and building_present_min_level equestrian stables and resource dogs or resource pigs or resource wild_animals or resource timber or resource hides or resource furs
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
	;------ dog ------
                recruit "barb wardogs" 0  requires factions { britons, dacia, gauls, germans, scythia, }
                recruit "carthaginian warhounds"  0  requires factions { spain, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, }
                recruit "roman wardogs"  0  requires factions { roman, greek, }
	;-----------------
;-----------------
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction 2
            cost 800
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                menagerie_pigsty
            }
        }
        menagerie_pigsty requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and building_present_min_level equestrian hippodrome and resource pigs or resource wild_animals or resource timber or resource hides or resource furs
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
	;------ dog ------
                recruit "barb wardogs" 0  requires factions { britons, dacia, gauls, germans, scythia, }
                recruit "carthaginian warhounds"  0  requires factions { spain, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, }
                recruit "roman wardogs"  0  requires factions { roman, greek, }
	;-----------------
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
	;------ pig ------
                recruit "barb incendiary pigs" 0  requires factions { britons, dacia, gauls, germans, scythia, }
                recruit "greek incendiary pigs"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, spain, }
                recruit "roman pigs"  0  requires factions { roman, greek, }
	;-----------------
;-----------------
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building encampment
{
    levels encampment_01 encampment_02 encampment_03 encampment_04
    {
        encampment_01 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and resource camels or resource elephants
        {
            capability
            {
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction 1
            cost 400
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                encampment_02
            }
        }
        encampment_02 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level equestrian cavalry_barracks and resource camels or resource elephants
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "carthaginian elephant forest"  0  requires factions { carthage, parthia, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "numidian camel riders"  0  requires factions { numidia, }  and resource camels
                recruit "greek elephant small"  0  requires factions { greek, roman, egyptian, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "bi camel raiders"  0  requires factions { armenia, pontus, }  and resource camels
;-----------------
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction 3
            cost 1600
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                encampment_03
            }
        }
        encampment_03 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level equestrian hippodrome and building_present_min_level missiles target_field and resource camels or resource elephants
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "carthaginian elephant forest"  0  requires factions { carthage, parthia, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "numidian camel riders"  0  requires factions { numidia, }  and resource camels
                recruit "greek elephant small"  0  requires factions { greek, roman, egyptian, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "bi camel raiders"  0  requires factions { armenia, pontus, }  and resource camels
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
                recruit "carthaginian elephant forest"  0  requires factions { numidia, armenia, pontus, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "carthaginian elephant african"  0  requires factions { carthage, parthia, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "greek elephant african"  0  requires factions { greek, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "egyptian bedouin"  0  requires factions { egyptian, }  and resource camels
                recruit "bi dromedarii"  0  requires factions { roman, } and resource camels
;-----------------
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 5
            }
            construction 5
            cost 3200
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
		encampment_04
            }
        }
        encampment_04 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level equestrian circus_maximus and resource camels or resource elephants
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "carthaginian elephant forest"  0  requires factions { carthage, parthia, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "numidian camel riders"  0  requires factions { numidia, }  and resource camels
                recruit "greek elephant small"  0  requires factions { greek, roman, egyptian, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "bi camel raiders"  0  requires factions { armenia, pontus, }  and resource camels
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
                recruit "carthaginian elephant forest"  0  requires factions { numidia, armenia, pontus, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "carthaginian elephant african"  0  requires factions { carthage, parthia, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "greek elephant african"  0  requires factions { greek, }  and resource elephants
                recruit "egyptian bedouin"  0  requires factions { egyptian, }  and resource camels
                recruit "bi dromedarii"  0  requires factions { roman, } and resource camels

                recruit "east camel cataphract"  0  requires factions { parthia, }  and resource camels
                recruit "greek elephant cataphract"  0  requires factions { seleucid, }  and resource elephants
;-----------------
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 6
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400

            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins

building missiles
{
    levels target_field practice_field archery_range catapult_range siege_engineer 
    {
        target_field requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
        {
            capability
            {
            }
            construction 1
            cost 400
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                practice_field
            }
        }
        practice_field requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "carthaginian peltast"  0  requires factions { spain, carthage, } 
                recruit "barb peltast gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, germans, } 
                recruit "barb slinger briton"  0  requires factions { britons, } 
                recruit "barb archer dacian"  0  requires factions { dacia, scythia, } 
                recruit "carthaginian archer"  0  requires factions { numidia, } 
                recruit "east peltast"  0  requires factions { armenia, pontus, } 
                recruit "east slinger"  0  requires factions { parthia, } 
                recruit "egyptian peltast"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "egyptian slingers"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek peltast"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman velite"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman light infantry auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                archery_range
            }
        }
        archery_range requires factions { spain, scythia, germans, gauls, dacia, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "carthaginian peltast"  0  requires factions { spain, carthage, } 
                recruit "barb peltast gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, germans, } 
                recruit "barb slinger briton"  0  requires factions { britons, } 
                recruit "barb archer dacian"  0  requires factions { dacia, scythia, } 
                recruit "carthaginian archer"  0  requires factions { numidia, } 
                recruit "east peltast"  0  requires factions { armenia, pontus, } 
                recruit "east slinger"  0  requires factions { parthia, } 
                recruit "egyptian peltast"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "egyptian slingers"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek peltast"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman velite"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman light infantry auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
                recruit "carthaginian slinger"  0  requires factions { spain, carthaginian, } 
                recruit "warband archer german"  0  requires factions { germans, dacia, scythia, } 
                recruit "warband huntsman gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, } 
                recruit "east archer"  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                recruit "egyptian archer"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek archer"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman archer"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman archer auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
                recruit "greek onager"  0  requires factions { dacia, scythia, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
;-----------------
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  2400 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                catapult_range
            }
        }
        catapult_range requires factions { spain, scythia, germans, gauls, dacia, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "carthaginian peltast"  0  requires factions { spain, carthage, } 
                recruit "barb peltast gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, germans, } 
                recruit "barb slinger briton"  0  requires factions { britons, } 
                recruit "barb archer dacian"  0  requires factions { dacia, scythia, } 
                recruit "carthaginian archer"  0  requires factions { numidia, } 
                recruit "east peltast"  0  requires factions { armenia, pontus, } 
                recruit "east slinger"  0  requires factions { parthia, } 
                recruit "egyptian peltast"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "egyptian slingers"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek peltast"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman velite"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman light infantry auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
                recruit "carthaginian slinger"  0  requires factions { spain, carthaginian, } 
                recruit "warband archer german"  0  requires factions { germans, dacia, scythia, } 
                recruit "warband huntsman gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, } 
                recruit "east archer"  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                recruit "egyptian archer"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek archer"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman archer"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman archer auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
;------- 3 -------
                recruit "egyptian archer elite"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek heavy peltast"  0  requires factions { greek_cities, } 
                recruit "greek onager"  0  requires factions { thrace, seleucid, macedon, barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, } 
                recruit "greek onager"  0  requires factions { egyptian, greek_cities, } and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
                recruit "roman onager"  0  requires factions { roman, } 
;-----------------
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  4800 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                siege_engineer
            }
        }
        siege_engineer requires factions { carthage, egypt, macedon, greek_cities, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "carthaginian peltast"  0  requires factions { spain, carthage, } 
                recruit "barb peltast gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, germans, } 
                recruit "barb slinger briton"  0  requires factions { britons, } 
                recruit "barb archer dacian"  0  requires factions { dacia, scythia, } 
                recruit "carthaginian archer"  0  requires factions { numidia, } 
                recruit "east peltast"  0  requires factions { armenia, pontus, } 
                recruit "east slinger"  0  requires factions { parthia, } 
                recruit "egyptian peltast"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "egyptian slingers"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek peltast"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman velite"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman light infantry auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
                recruit "carthaginian slinger"  0  requires factions { spain, carthaginian, } 
                recruit "warband archer german"  0  requires factions { germans, dacia, scythia, } 
                recruit "warband huntsman gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, } 
                recruit "east archer"  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                recruit "egyptian archer"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek archer"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "roman archer"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and not marian_reforms 
                recruit "roman archer auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, }  and marian_reforms 
;-----------------
;------- 3 -------
                recruit "egyptian archer elite"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "greek heavy peltast"  0  requires factions { greek_cities, } 
                recruit "greek onager"  0  requires factions { greek, barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, } 
                recruit "roman onager"  0  requires factions { roman, } 
;-----------------
;------- 4 -------
                recruit "greek heavy onager"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                recruit "roman heavy onager"  0  requires factions { roman, } 
;-----------------
            }
            construction  7 
            cost  9600 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building ballista_yard
{
    levels ballista_yard_01 ballista_yard_02 ballista_yard_03
    {
        ballista_yard_01 requires factions { dacia, macedon, greek_cities, roman, } and building_present_min_level missiles archery_range
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "greek ballista"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, }
                recruit "roman ballista"  0  requires factions { roman, }
;-----------------
            }
            construction 3
            cost 1600
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
		ballista_yard_02
            }
        }
        ballista_yard_02 requires factions { roman, } and building_present_min_level missiles catapult_range
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "greek ballista"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, }
                recruit "roman ballista"  0  requires factions { roman, }
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
                recruit "roman scorpion"  0  requires factions { roman, }
                recruit "greek scorpion"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, }
;-----------------
            }
            construction 5
            cost 3200
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
		ballista_yard_03
            }
        }
        ballista_yard_03 requires factions { roman, } and building_present_min_level missiles siege_engineer
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "greek ballista"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, }
                recruit "roman ballista"  0  requires factions { roman, }
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
                recruit "roman scorpion"  0  requires factions { roman, }
                recruit "greek scorpion"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, }
;-----------------
;------- 3 -------
                recruit "roman repeating ballista"  0  requires factions { roman, }
                recruit "greek repeating ballista"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, }
;-----------------

            construction  6 
            cost  6400

building market
{
    levels trader market forum great_forum curia 
    {
        trader requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  600 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                market
            }
        }
        market requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                forum
            }
        }
        forum requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  2400 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                great_forum
            }
        }
        great_forum requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  4800 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                curia
            }
        }
        curia requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 5
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  7 
            cost  9600 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

    levels port shipwright dockyard 
    {
        port requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval pirate ships"  0  requires factions { slave, }
                trade_fleet 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800

                shipwright
            }
        }
        shipwright requires factions { barbarian, carthage, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval large boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval pirate ships"  0  requires factions { slave, }
                trade_fleet 2
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                dockyard
            }
        }
        dockyard requires factions { barbarian, carthage, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval large boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval quinquiremes"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }

    levels roads paved_roads highways
    {
        roads requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                road_level 0
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                paved_roads
            }
        }
        paved_roads requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level market forum or building_present_min_level health sewers
        {
            capability
            {
                road_level 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                highways
            }
        }
        highways requires factions { roman, egypt, greek_cities, macedon, seleucid, carthage, } and building_present_min_level market great_forum or building_present_min_level amphitheatres stone_amphitheatre
        {
            capability
            {
                road_level 2
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  2400 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }

    }

building temple_of_battle
{
    levels temple_of_battle_shrine temple_of_battle_temple temple_of_battle_large_temple temple_of_battle_awesome_temple temple_of_battle_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_battle_shrine requires factions { gauls, britons, dacia, scythia, thrace, macedon, pontus, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_julii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_battle_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_battle_temple requires factions { gauls, britons, dacia, scythia, thrace, macedon, pontus, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_julii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_battle_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_battle_large_temple requires factions { gauls, britons, dacia, scythia, thrace, macedon, pontus, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_julii, } 
        {
            capability

                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades

                temple_of_battle_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_battle_awesome_temple requires factions { gauls, britons, dacia, scythia, thrace, macedon, pontus, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_julii, } 
        {

                happiness_bonus bonus 4

                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city

                temple_of_battle_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_battle_pantheon requires factions { gauls, britons, dacia, scythia, thrace, macedon, pontus, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_julii, } 
        {

                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 3

            construction  6 
            cost  6400

{
    levels temple_of_battleforge_shrine temple_of_battleforge_temple temple_of_battleforge_large_temple temple_of_battleforge_awesome_temple temple_of_battleforge_pantheon

                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }

            }
        }
        temple_of_battleforge_temple requires factions { germans, dacia, spain, gauls, armenia, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                weapon_simple bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_battleforge_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_battleforge_large_temple requires factions { germans, dacia, spain, gauls, armenia, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                weapon_simple bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_battleforge_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_battleforge_awesome_temple requires factions { germans, dacia, spain, gauls, armenia, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                weapon_simple bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 2
                armour bonus 1
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
		temple_of_battleforge_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_battleforge_pantheon requires factions { germans, dacia, spain, gauls, armenia, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                weapon_simple bonus 1
                weapon_bladed bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 3
                armour bonus 1
                law_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

{
    levels temple_of_leadership_shrine temple_of_leadership_temple temple_of_leadership_large_temple temple_of_leadership_awesome_temple temple_of_leadership_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_leadership_shrine requires factions { britons, greek_cities, armenia, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                law_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_leadership_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_leadership_temple requires factions { britons, greek_cities, armenia, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_leadership_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_leadership_large_temple requires factions { britons, greek_cities, armenia, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_leadership_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_leadership_awesome_temple requires factions { britons, greek_cities, armenia, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                law_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_leadership_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_leadership_pantheon requires factions { britons, greek_cities, armenia, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 7
                law_bonus bonus 5
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building temple_of_love
{
    levels temple_of_love_shrine temple_of_love_temple temple_of_love_large_temple temple_of_love_awesome_temple temple_of_love_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_love_shrine requires factions { germans, pontus, greek_cities, armenia, romans_julii, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_temple requires factions { germans, pontus, greek_cities, armenia, romans_julii, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_large_temple requires factions { germans, pontus, greek_cities, armenia, romans_julii, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                population_growth_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_awesome_temple requires factions { germans, pontus, greek_cities, armenia, romans_julii, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                population_growth_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_pantheon requires factions { germans, pontus, greek_cities, armenia, romans_julii, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 7
                population_growth_bonus bonus 5
                law_bonus bonus 2
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building temple_of_naval
{
    levels temple_of_naval_shrine temple_of_naval_temple temple_of_naval_large_temple temple_of_naval_awesome_temple temple_of_naval_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_naval_shrine requires factions { britons, romans_scipii, greek_cities, carthage, }  and building_present_min_level port_buildings port
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  1  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  1  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval pirate ships"  1  requires factions { slave, }
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_naval_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_naval_temple requires factions { britons, romans_scipii, greek_cities, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  2  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  2  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval pirate ships"  2  requires factions { slave, }
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_naval_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_naval_large_temple requires factions { britons, romans_scipii, greek_cities, carthage, } and building_present_min_level port_buildings shipwright
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  3  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval large boats"  1  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  3  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  1  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval pirate ships"  3  requires factions { slave, }
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_naval_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_naval_awesome_temple requires factions { britons, romans_scipii, greek_cities, carthage, } and building_present_min_level port_buildings dockyard
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  4  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval large boats"  2  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  4  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  2  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval quinquiremes"  1  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval corvus quinquireme"  0  requires factions { roman, greek, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, } 
                recruit "naval pirate ships"  4  requires factions { slave, }
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_naval_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_naval_pantheon requires factions { britons, romans_scipii, greek_cities, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  5  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval large boats"  3  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  5  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  3  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval quinquiremes"  2  requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval corvus quinquireme"  1  requires factions { roman, greek, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, } 
                recruit "naval deceres"  0  requires factions { roman, greek, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, } 
                recruit "naval pirate ships"  5  requires factions { slave, }
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
                weapon_simple bonus 1
                weapon_bladed bonus 1
                armour bonus 1
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building temple_of_trade
{
    levels temple_of_trade_shrine temple_of_trade_temple temple_of_trade_large_temple temple_of_trade_awesome_temple temple_of_trade_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_trade_shrine requires factions { britons, carthaginian, greek_cities, romans_brutii, armenia, parthia, egypt, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_trade_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_trade_temple requires factions { britons, carthaginian, greek_cities, romans_brutii, armenia, parthia, egypt, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_trade_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_trade_large_temple requires factions { britons, carthaginian, greek_cities, romans_brutii, armenia, parthia, egypt, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_trade_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_trade_awesome_temple requires factions { britons, carthaginian, greek_cities, romans_brutii, armenia, parthia, egypt, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_trade_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_trade_pantheon requires factions { britons, carthaginian, greek_cities, romans_brutii, armenia, parthia, egypt, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 5
                population_health_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building temple_of_victory
{
    levels temple_of_victory_shrine temple_of_victory_temple temple_of_victory_large_temple temple_of_victory_awesome_temple temple_of_victory_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_victory_shrine requires factions { britons, greek_cities, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_victory_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_victory_temple requires factions { britons, greek_cities, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_victory_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_victory_large_temple requires factions { britons, greek_cities, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_victory_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_victory_awesome_temple requires factions { britons, greek_cities, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_victory_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_victory_pantheon requires factions { britons, greek_cities, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                recruits_exp_bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }

                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }

                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 3

                law_bonus bonus 2

            cost  6400

        }
    }

    levels temple_of_viking_shrine temple_of_viking_temple temple_of_viking_large_temple temple_of_viking_awesome_temple temple_of_viking_pantheon

        temple_of_viking_shrine requires factions { germans, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400

            upgrades

                temple_of_viking_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_viking_temple requires factions { germans, carthage, }

                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 2

            construction  2 
            cost  800

                temple_of_viking_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_viking_large_temple requires factions { germans, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
		temple_of_viking_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_viking_awesome_temple requires factions { germans, carthage, }
        {
            capability

                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200

                happiness_bonus bonus 5

                population_growth_bonus bonus 1

            construction  6 
            cost  6400

building temple_of_home
{
    levels temple_of_home_shrine temple_of_home_temple temple_of_home_large_temple temple_of_home_awesome_temple temple_of_home_pantheon
    {
        temple_of_home_shrine requires factions { dacia, scythia, thrace, romans_brutii, egypt, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                population_loyalty_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_home_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_home_temple requires factions { dacia, scythia, thrace, romans_brutii, egypt, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                population_loyalty_bonus bonus 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_home_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_home_large_temple requires factions { dacia, scythia, thrace, romans_brutii, egypt, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                population_loyalty_bonus bonus 2
                farming_level bonus 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
		temple_of_home_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_home_awesome_temple requires factions { dacia, scythia, thrace, romans_brutii, egypt, }
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                population_loyalty_bonus bonus 3
                farming_level bonus 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus  1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_home_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_home_pantheon requires factions { dacia, scythia, thrace, romans_brutii, egypt, }
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                population_loyalty_bonus bonus 4
                farming_level bonus 2
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus  2
                population_health_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }

building temple_of_nature
{
    levels temple_of_nature_shrine temple_of_nature_temple temple_of_nature_large_temple temple_of_nature_awesome_temple temple_of_nature_pantheon
    {
        temple_of_nature_shrine requires factions { britons, gauls, seleucid, parthia, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                farming_level bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_nature_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_nature_temple requires factions { britons, gauls, seleucid, parthia, } 
        {
            capability

                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                farming_level bonus 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
            }

            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town

            }
        }

            capability

                population_health_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
		temple_of_nature_awesome_temple
            }
        }

                population_health_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_nature_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_nature_pantheon requires factions { britons, gauls, seleucid,  parthia, }
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                population_health_bonus bonus 3
                farming_level bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 2
                weapon_simple bonus 1
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city

            }

    }

building temple_of_sun
{
    levels temple_of_sun_shrine temple_of_sun_temple temple_of_sun_large_temple temple_of_sun_awesome_temple temple_of_sun_pantheon
    {
        temple_of_sun_shrine requires factions { gauls, scythia, macedon, armenia, romans_julii, romans_scipii, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_sun_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_sun_temple requires factions { gauls, scythia, macedon, armenia, romans_julii, romans_scipii, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                farming_level bonus 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_sun_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_sun_large_temple requires factions { gauls, scythia, macedon, armenia, romans_julii, romans_scipii, carthage, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                farming_level bonus 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
                weapon_missile bonus 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
		temple_of_sun_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_sun_awesome_temple requires factions { gauls, scythia, macedon, armenia, romans_julii, romans_scipii, carthage, }
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                farming_level bonus 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
                weapon_missile bonus 1
                armour bonus 1
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_sun_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_sun_pantheon requires factions { gauls, scythia, macedon, armenia, romans_julii, romans_scipii, carthage, }
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 7
                population_health_bonus bonus 2
                farming_level bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
                weapon_missile bonus 1
                armour bonus 1
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

{
    levels circle_of_priests_01 warforge_halls nature_halls defenders_halls halls_of_law halls_of_cruelty leadership_halls halls_of_victory
    {
        circle_of_priests_01 requires factions { barbarian, armenia, carthage, romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, } and not building_present_min_level priestly_community_02 circle_of_priests_02 and building_present_min_level temple_of_battleforge temple_of_battleforge_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_farming temple_of_farming_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_fertility temple_of_fertility_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_fun temple_of_fun_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_law temple_of_law_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_justice temple_of_justice_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_leadership temple_of_leadership_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_violence temple_of_violence_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_trade temple_of_trade_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_victory temple_of_victory_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_defender temple_of_defender_shrine or building_present_min_level temple_of_nature temple_of_nature_shrine
        {

                population_loyalty_bonus bonus 1
            }

            }

building population_adjustment
{
    levels control_growth_of_population resettlement_01 resettlement_02 resettlement_03 resettlement_04 suburbs_peasant villages_peasant towns_peasant cities_peasant
    {
        control_growth_of_population requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
            capability
            {
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
		resettlement_01
		suburbs_peasant
            }
        }
        resettlement_01 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
            capability
            {
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction 1
            cost 400
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                resettlement_02
            }
        }
        resettlement_02 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
            capability
            {
                population_growth_bonus bonus 4
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 6
            }
            construction 2
            cost 800
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                resettlement_03
            }
        }
        resettlement_03 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
            capability
            {
                population_growth_bonus bonus 6
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 9
            }
            construction 3
            cost 1600
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
		resettlement_04
            }
        }
        resettlement_04 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
            capability
            {
                population_growth_bonus bonus 8
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 12
            }
            construction 5
            cost 3200
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
        suburbs_peasant requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
            capability
            {
                population_growth_bonus bonus -2
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -3
            }
            construction  1
            cost 400
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                villages_peasant
            }
        }
        villages_peasant requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
            capability
            {
                population_growth_bonus bonus -4
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -6
            }
            construction  2
            cost 800
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                towns_peasant
            }
        }
        towns_peasant  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
             capability
             {
                population_growth_bonus bonus -6
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -9
             }
             construction  3
             cost 1600
             settlement_min city
             upgrades
             {
                 cities_peasant
             }
        }
        cities_peasant requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
            capability
            {
                population_growth_bonus bonus -8
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -12
            }
            construction  5
            cost 3200
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building guild_center
{
    levels guild_center_00 mercenary_guild_01 mercenary_guild_02 mercenary_guild_03 mercenary_guild_04 veterans_guild_01 veterans_guild_02 veterans_guild_03
    {
        guild_center_00 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management
        {
            capability
            {
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction 1
            cost 400
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                mercenary_guild_01
		veterans_guild_01
            }
        }
        mercenary_guild_01 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and building_present_min_level barracks muster_field and building_present_min_level missiles target_field
        {
            capability
            {
;-------- 1 ------------
                recruit "merc barbarian infantry"  0 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc horse archers"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc eastern infantry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
;-----------------------
		population_loyalty_bonus bonus -1
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction 1
            cost 400
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                mercenary_guild_02
            }
        }
        mercenary_guild_02 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and building_present_min_level equestrian stables and building_present_min_level barracks militia_barracks and building_present_min_level missiles practice_field
        {
            capability
            {
;-------- 1 ------------
                recruit "merc barbarian infantry"  0 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc horse archers"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc eastern infantry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
;-----------------------
;-------- 2 ------------
                recruit "merc greek hoplites"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc barbarian cavalry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc numidian cavalry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
;-----------------------
		population_loyalty_bonus bonus -1
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction 2
            cost 800
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                mercenary_guild_03
            }
        }
        mercenary_guild_03 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and building_present_min_level equestrian cavalry_barracks and building_present_min_level smith blacksmith
        {
            capability
            {
;-------- 1 ------------
                recruit "merc barbarian infantry"  0 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc horse archers"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc eastern infantry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
;-----------------------
;-------- 2 ------------
                recruit "merc greek hoplites"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc barbarian cavalry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc numidian cavalry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
;-----------------------
;-------- 3 ------------
                recruit "merc spanish infantry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc thracian"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc sarmatian cavalry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
