                taxable_income_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction 3
            cost 1600
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
		mercenary_guild_04
            }
        }
        mercenary_guild_04 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
        {
            capability
            {
;-------- 1 ------------
                recruit "merc barbarian infantry"  0 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }

                recruit "merc greek hoplites"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc barbarian cavalry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }

;-----------------------

                recruit "merc spanish infantry"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                recruit "merc thracian"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, }

        }
        veterans_guild_01 requires factions { roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and marian_reforms and building_present_min_level barracks militia_barracks and building_present_min_level equestrian stables and building_present_min_level missiles practice_field

            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "roman hastati"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman light cavalry"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman velite"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
;-----------------
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -3
            }
            construction 2
            cost 800
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
		veterans_guild_02
            }
        }
        veterans_guild_02 requires factions { roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and marian_reforms and building_present_min_level barracks city_barracks and building_present_min_level equestrian cavalry_barracks and building_present_min_level missiles archery_range
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "roman hastati"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman light cavalry"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman velite"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
                recruit "roman princeps"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman cavalry auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman archer"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
;-----------------
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -6
            }
            construction 3
            cost 1600
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
		veterans_guild_03
            }
        }
        veterans_guild_03 requires factions { roman, } and building_present_min_level management_peasant common_management and marian_reforms and building_present_min_level barracks army_barracks and building_present_min_level equestrian hippodrome and building_present_min_level missiles archery_range
        {
            capability
            {
;------- 1 -------
                recruit "roman hastati"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman light cavalry"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman velite"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
;-----------------
;------- 2 -------
                recruit "roman princeps"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman cavalry auxillia"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
                recruit "roman archer"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, }

                recruit "bi scholae palatinae"  0  requires factions { roman, macedon, slave, }
;-----------------

{
    levels test_01_one test_01_two test_01_three test_01_four test_01_five

        test_01_one requires factions { britons, }
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
		taxable_income_bonus bonus 5
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                test_01_two
            }
        }

        test_01_two requires factions { britons, }
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 2
		taxable_income_bonus bonus 10
            }

            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades

                test_01_three
            }
        }

                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 3
		taxable_income_bonus bonus 15
            }

            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades

		test_01_four
            }
        }
